items.content_html:
Masayuki Hatta@mhatta Is scientific writing becoming stupider and more emotional?

Is scientific writing becoming stupider and more emotional? - Marginal REVOLUTION

Yikes awful absolutely, demeaningly, absurdly so: Writing in a clear and simple language is critical for scientific communications. Previous studies argued that the use of adjectives and adverbs cluttered writing and made scientific text less readable. The present study aims to investigate if the articles in life sciences have become more cluttered and less readable [â€¦]
